import { FunctionComponent, useState , useEffect} from "react"; import Navbar from "../components/navbar"; import Slider from "../components/slider"; import { Router, useNavigate,Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ProductTemplate from "../components/ProductTemplate"; import Products from "../productData"; import SideNavbar from "../components/sidenavbar"; import ProdTem from "../components/productTem"; //import { InsertProducts } from '../server/routes/productRoutes'; type Product = { id: number; name: String; imageSrc: String; store: String, price: number, description: String }; const Desktop1: FunctionComponent = () => { useEffect(() => { const performPostAction = async () => { try { console.log('POST reques'); const response = await fetch('/prod/insert'); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error(`HTTP error! Status: ${response.status}`); } const data = await response.json(); console.log("Record inserted", data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error making POST request:", error); } }; performPostAction(); }, []); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [SelectedProduct, setSelectedProduct] = useState(null); // Specify the type for useState const handleProductClick = (product: Product) => { setSelectedProduct(product); navigate(`/desktop-3/${product.id}`); }; const [selectedOption, setSelectedOption] = useState(''); // Specify the type as string const handleSelectOption = (option: string) => { setSelectedOption(option); }; const handleAddToCartClick = (product : Product) => { setSelectedProduct(product); navigate(`/desktop-2/${product.id}`); }; return (
